code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{Box}from'@mui/material';import{Videos,ChannelCard}from'./';import{fetchFromAPI}from"../utils/fetchFromAPI";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChannelDetail=()=>{const[ChannelDetail,setChannelDetail]=useState(null);const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{fetchFromAPI("channels?part=snippet&id=".concat(id)).then(data=>setChannelDetail(data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.items[0]));fetchFromAPI("search?channelId=".concat(id,"&part=snippet&order=date")).then(data=>setVideos(data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.items));},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{minHeight:"95vh",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{background:'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(227,227,227,1) 33%, rgba(236,202,156,1) 67%)',zIndex:10,height:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChannelCard,{channelDetail:ChannelDetail,marginTop:"-110px"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mr:{sm:'100px'}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{videos:videos})]})]});};export default ChannelDetail;
